text:
*How to Create how to update or create an association with existing HubSpot records which is created by other source using Ecommerce Bridge API*

I could able to create a contact, deal, and line item but the problem I see is I am not able to use/update the existing records using eCommerce bridge. Is there any option to update or create an association that is created by some other source or HubSpot?
Also would like to know, right now we are using API for creating contact, deals, line items. Is there any impact on the HubSpot when I go with the eCommerce bridge?
